item.title: Introducing Rheo Cc
item.description: Welcome Welcome to Rheo.cc! I built this site as something of a staging ground for various concepts I am researching/presenting/talking about/considering. In that respect it’s something of a scratch-pad where I can (semi-)anonymously throw (mis-?)information at the Universe and see what happens. I envision it eventually taking the shape of an old-school personal blog, รก la Blogger pre-2005, but we’ll see. About me My name is Jason and I currently work as a Data Scientist and occasional Software Engineer.
